title: ISic001071. I.Sicily inscription 001071
body:
Facsimile Images

ἐκοιμήθη
Ὑγῖνος μηνὶ
Νοβεμβρίῳ, ὅτε
ἀπὸ κα(λανδῶν) κα´ ((·))
5ἡμέρα Ἑρμοῦ

Apparatus criticus

Text of Kaibel in IG; The form of the alpha in κα(λανδῶν) is distinctive in the reported editions, and may represent ΚΑΛ in ligature

translation

commentary

Similar in form to IG 14.249

II https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002465 1046 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394 Paci 2005 no.6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001688
